body.name: Keurig K-Express Coffee Maker, Single Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Brewer, Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by TRENDY-TECH (We Record Serial Numbers) and Fulfilled by Amazon.

features: STRONG BREW: Increases the strength and bold taste of your coffee’s flavor.
3 CUP SIZES: Brew an 8, 10, or 12 oz. cup at the push of a button.
MULTIPLE CUP WATER RESERVOIR: 42oz. removable reservoir lets you brew up to 4 cups before refilling. 8 oz. cup size
FAST & FRESH BREWED: Delicious coffee made in minutes.
TRAVEL MUG FRIENDLY: Removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7.4” tall.
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Auto off feature turns off your coffee maker 5 minutes after the last brew, helping to save energy.
COMPATIBLE WITH THE MY K-CUP UNIVERSAL REUSABLE COFFEE FILTER: Brew your own ground coffee (sold separately).
body.description: Welcome to Keurig quality, at our most welcoming price. Enjoy rich, full-flavored taste every time you brew with the Keurig K-Express Single Serve Coffee Maker. Whether you’re looking to start your morning strong or need the perfect afternoon pick-me-up, use the STRONG button for a bolder, more intense coffee taste. And speaking of bold – the sleek, modern design of the K-Express coffee maker makes a big impression in any kitchen. Enjoy an 8, 10, or 12oz. cup of your favorite beverages – all fast and freshly brewed in minutes at the touch of a button. The 42oz. removable reservoir lets you brew up to 4 cups* before refilling, and back-to-back brewing means you don’t have to wait for your brewer to reheat before brewing a second cup. Plus, you can choose your favorites from the hundreds of coffee brands and flavors available in K-Cup pods, including tea or hot cocoa. You can even use a My K-Cup Reusable Coffee Filter (sold separately) with your own favorite ground coffee. And all of this comes at a price that helps you put America’s #1 single serve coffee maker brand on your counter. *8 oz. cup size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple, sleek, effective
reviews.reviewText: Needed to replace my old Keurig that was about twice the size. Happy with this purchase, it fits the smaller space I moved it to and still tastes great. I mainly used it for iced coffees, so I wish it had a setting for that like some others do, but coffee still comes out tasting good, just a little more watered down.Easy to clean, use, and it is smaller so I expected to have to refill the water tank more often. Haven't had any issues in the past few months of use. Recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Actual Good Cup Of Coffee
reviews.reviewText: Original post - *with an important new update at the end about Descaling*:So, like all Keurigs, it is convenient and quick to use. I decided I didn’t need any extra features which I never use, so I got this simple little machine even though the water tank is relatively small - it makes three 10 Oz cups before needing a re-fill. I love the small counter-top footprint.What I didn’t know, and have never seen before on any other Keurig I’ve ever purchased, is that it makes a cup of coffee that is, imo, as good tasting as any coffee maker or French press. I waited a few weeks to make sure. I am writing this review because this is the first Keurig that I can drink my coffee black, without creamer, and taste and enjoy the flavor as advertised on the pod.Black coffee. From a Keurig. It’s a first for me, and this little machine … for some strange reason … is able to make it very well. Been enjoying it a lot.Update - Descale: the descale light came on after about a month. There is a special procedure that must be followed, which puts the machine in “Descale Mode”, which is this:a: Pour cleaning solution into empty tank (bottled or vinegar/water substitute).b: Place 16oz mug on tray.c: Activate Descale Mode … Begin with power off (all lights are off); press and hold (unlit) 8oz and 12oz buttons for 3 seconds; the Descale light and 12oz light (only) will begin to flash - this indicates machine is now in descale mode.d: Press the flashing 12oz button - it runs. Repeat until Add Water light illuminates.e: Rinse tank and add water to full.f: Machine is still in Descale Mode (indicated by 12oz light and Descale light still flashing), so press flashing 12oz button and repeat until both flashing lights go out.g: Descale is complete and Descale light is out (yay!).Note 1: This is the only way to get the Descale light to go out.Note 2: Searching the internet for a solution shows the problem is common and the solution is non-existent (Google was worthless). Turns out … just read the instructions insert (!).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NOT GOOD. BAD SERVICE.
reviews.reviewText: Don't buy this product. This coffee maker stopped working after about three weeks. Customer service wanted me to take a picture of the machine, with my name and the dats, and I did that. After a few days, I got no email or information about the return, so I called again. I was told to take a picture of the machine and my name, AGAIN. Still, no response. I called a third time, and was asked to send the machine back so they can prosses my return. This doesn't work. Kurig was a bad experience for me. Such a hassle, do yourself a favor, get something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good coffee maker - with one flaw
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a good coffee maker, perfect size for my office. Works well and quickly makes coffee. My only complaint is that when the water tank is just below halfway full, the "Add water" indicator lights up. At that point, it won't work again until you fill the tank up. Why have such a large tank if you can't use it all?I've tried to contact Keurig support, but they do not answer any questions via email. You have to call their support number. This takes up time going through the troubleshooting process with an agent, only to end up right back where you started. They replaced the tank on mine, but it did not fix the problem and they won't do anything else until I call again. So at this point I'm just going to live with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny machine, BIG improvement!
reviews.reviewText: I have probably owned 6 K-cup machines and so far, this one is my favorite! We’ve had an off brand, a Keurig office type, then a few that were good, but not great. This one is my favorite. The strong option isn’t super strong, but stronger than normal which is perfect for us. It brews super fast AND much quieter than any other I’ve ever owned! It’s feels sturdy to use and barely takes up any counter space. I just got it yesterday and we’ve used it at least 10 times already! We use ours for coffee, cider and cocoa. My 14yr old son says his cider tastes better with the strong option. So far, so AWESOME for us! If you’re looking for a k-cup machine, this is the only one out of all the ones I’ve ever owned that I would highly recommend. Plus, it was $30 off the MSRP! I’m tempted to get another and leave it boxed because appliances don’t last forever, but with this one, I will probably be better about maintenance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New Coffee Drinker, New Keurig
reviews.reviewText: I've never been a coffee drinker. It had always been Diet Coke in the morning for me. As it would turn out, I just didn't think I liked coffee because I was trying to drink it like everyone else told me THEY like it. I tried it black about a month ago, and have been hooked. This little Keurig has been the perfect machine for me. Makes coffee fast, makes coffee good. It's clean, easy, and I can use the reusable K Cups with it no problem. I don't like that the "add water" light comes on when the reservoir is still half full, but that's a minor complaint amongst all of the positives. Highly recommended coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent all around coffee maker.
reviews.reviewText: Compact size, good water capacity and it makes great strong coffee. I returned the "Slim" model because the coffee was weak. Pass on the "Multistream Technology" models, you get much results with the Strong Brew Button.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tried another brand, back to Keurig!
reviews.reviewText: I had a very large Keurig coffee maker, it took up too much of my counter space. So I got a single serve (14 oz reservoir) ChefMan k-cup machine. It was cute, compact and made a good cuppa. But it finally wore out. And since I make about 3 cups of tea and coffee per day, I found this perfect 42 oz reservoir that is narrow and deep. So it sits up against a wall and takes up very little counter space. And of course, Keurig makes a great cup of coffee. Unlike some reviews I saw, I have no leaking problems, and no issues with clearing the 'add water' and 'descale' lights. This coffee maker is much sturdier that the Chefman. 👍👍
El tamaño de los cartuchos coopera a producir un buen café.

reviews.reviewTitle: Space saver, love the reservoir, brews super fast
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I have owned a couple of Keurig machines over the years so I am not new to the brand. But I love this Keurig K-express and how convenient it is.This is a nice looking machine and it has a narrow design so it does not take up as much counter space as other models. I like that this has a reservoir for water which is different from other mini machines. This makes it much more convenient to use because I don't have to fill it every time I go brew a cup of coffee.This Keurig machine can brew 3 different sizes of coffee, 8 oz, 10 oz and 12 oz, so you can have a stronger or milder brew with just the press of a button.As soon as I put the lid down and selected the size coffee I wanted brewed it immediately began filtering water through my coffee pod and into the cup. This cuts down significantly on the amount of time it takes to brew a cup of coffee.You can fit multiple sizes of cups under the spout in different heights, you can remove the bottom part that catches any spilled coffee and fit a travel mug under it without any issues.This brews a delicious cup of coffee in very little time and is super convenient, a space saver and a nice design. Definitely a great purchase!

The media could not be loaded. Love this small Kuerig. It's slim and stylish and looks beautiful in my kitchen without taking up TONS of room. It works perfectly for the two adults and one teenager in our household. The water reservoir gives you approximately 3, 12oz cups of coffee before needing to be refilled. Refilling is simple and easy. You can also choose an 8oz or 10oz cup, which would give you more cups between refills obviously. Love this product. Definitely recommend.

¡Se descompuso en menos de un año! No compres este modelo. La compré en diciembre y comencé a usarla en enero. Es octubre y ya no funciona. Tengo otro modelo anterior que no ha tenido problemas en años.Cuando esta marcó que necesitaba descalcificación usé la solución, seguí las instrucciones y se apagó al terminar, lo esperado. Al intentar prenderla nuevamente vino la sorpresa, ya no prende, sólo parpadean dos veces las luces de los botones (8,10 y 12) y se apaga.Descalcificarla la convirtió en basura.
